attributes.action: Remove Ranjit  banwait as leader of Derby council.
attributes.background:
While Ranjit Banwait continues to Waste tax payers money
Derby has become a neglected ghost town 
Ranjit Banwait is slowly destroying Derby and it's services.
I am making a stand now and saying no more.

rejection.details:
You could raise your concerns with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
